remarks: Meet property of a lattice automorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
lautj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lautj.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
lautj $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( F e. I /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) .\/ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
